By The Canadian Press

Published: June 17, 2025 at 5:12AM EDT
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy makes his way to meet Prime Minister Mark Carney at the G7 Summit in Kananaskis, Alta., on Tuesday, June 17, 2025. THE CANADIAN PRESS/Adrian Wyld
